thread.title: Nike is now best-performing stock on the Dow for the year
thread.title_full: Nike is now best-performing stock on the Dow for the year - MarketWatch

author: Ciara Linnane
title: Nike is now best-performing stock on the Dow for the year
text:
Nike Inc. shares NKE, +8.89% surged 9% Friday and set an intraday high of $125.82, making it the top-performing stock on the Dow Jones Industrial Average in the year so far. Nike shares are up almost 31% in the year, while the Dow has fallen about 8%. If the stock holds these gains, it will set a record close and surpass $100 bilion in market capitalization for the first time. The stock is enjoying its biggest one-day point gain and biggest percentage gain since Sept. 26, 2014. The move came as analysts applauded first-quarter earnings that blew past expectations.
Read the full story: ‘Nike just smoked it’ and other bullish reactions to its earnings
